title: Trump says Netflix-Warner Bros. deal ‘could be a problem’
description: The $72 billion deal would combine the world’s No. 1 streaming player with the No. 4 service HBO Max, which has raised red flags from antitrust regulators.

title: Trump Warns Netflix-Warner Deal May Pose Antitrust ‘Problem’
description: US President Donald Trump raised potential antitrust concerns around Netflix Inc.’s planned $72 billion acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., noting that the market share of the combined entity may pose problems.

title: Netflix's superpower: breaking its own rules
description: Netflix's Warner Bros. Discovery deal marks a big M&A shift that will test its adaptability, content management, and integration skills.

title: Top analyst says Netflix’s $72 billion bet on Warner Bros. isn’t about the ‘death of Hollywood’ at all. It’s really about Google
description: “If I were Netflix,” S&P Global’s Melissa Otto told Fortune, “I would want to build a moat around my business.”

title: Netflix–Warner Bros. deal sets up $72 billion antitrust test
description: The company faces a lengthy DOJ review and a possible lawsuit seeking to block the deal if it doesn’t adopt some remedies to get it cleared, analysts said.

title: The 28-year rise of Netflix, from DVD-by-mail service to Hollywood juggernaut
description: Netflix, founded in 1997, has grown into the world's largest streaming service with more than 300 million subscribers worldwide.

title: 30 classic movies and TV shows that Netflix would own as part of its Warner Bros. deal
description: From the "Harry Potter" franchise to "Friends" and "The Wire," here are 30 beloved Warner Bros. titles that Netflix would own as part of its deal for WB.

title: Netflix doesn't want to turn HBO into Netflix — it wants to bundle it
description: Netflix became HBO faster than HBO could become Netflix. That's why Netflix is buying HBO. Here's what happens next.

title: 'Get all that Hermes stuff now': Netflix director accused of $11 million fraud rushed to buy luxury goods, texts show
description: Netflix director Carl Rinsch purchased a Swedish mattress that a trial witness said comes with a "bed doctor" who visits your house to massage it.

title: Reviews are in, and Hollywood insiders aren't pleased with the Netflix-Warner Bros. deal
description: The deal has raised concerns about job cuts, a lack of competition, and the future of the movie theater industry.

title: David Zaslav tells employees 'HBO Max will stay' after Netflix deal
description: Warner Bros. Discovery CEO David Zaslav told employees that "HBO Max will stay" after Netflix buys Warner Bros. and HBO in a media mega-merger.

title: What the Netflix/Warner Bros. Merger Could Mean for Streaming
description: Is HBO Max dead, and will you be able to watch 'Game of Thrones' on Netflix?

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024's New Crossover Is One You'll Never Expect
description:
Microsoft has announced the next crossover collaboration for Microsoft Flight Simulator 24, and it's none other than Netflix's hugely popular Stranger Things.
"Turn the skies upside down," Microsoft said in its announcement for a collaboration set to come to the game on December 9. The teaser video doesn't give much away, but one possibility is that the upcoming crossover will allow people to fly through Hawkins, the setting of Stranger Things.
If you look closely, you can see the aircraft in question in the video is a UH-1H Huey helicopter with the "Hawkins Heli-Tours" logo emblazoned on it.
Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: A Ferrari and over 480 takeout orders: FBI details spending spree of Netflix director in $11 million fraud case
description: Netflix earmarked $11 million to finish a futuristic sci-fi show. Prosecutors say director Carl Rinsch used it for cars and a lot of Uber Eats.

title: Film producers lobby Congress against Netflix-Warner Bros Discovery acquisition, Variety reports
Jury hears how Netflix director lost a fortune on options trades — days after streamer sent him $11M for 'visionary' show
description: In the weeks after Netflix wired him $11M, director Carl Eric Rinsch made so many failed, seven-figure option bets that his broker tried to stop him.

title: The 4 most shocking moments in Netflix's Diddy docuseries, broken down by director Alexandria Stapleton
description: A Netflix documentary's footage of Sean "Diddy" Combs in the days leading up to his arrest offers a unique look into the life of the fallen mogul.

title: Ex-Netflix executive details how a 'visionary' project slowly unraveled into an alleged $11 million fraud
description: Former Netflix exec Peter Friedlander described how director Carl Rinsch's ambitious sci-fi project turned into a Hollywood debacle and alleged fraud.

title: Netflix, Warner Bros Discovery combo seen lowering costs for consumers, sources say
Netflix Is Killing Casting From Your Phone
description: Unless you have older hardware, you can't cast Netflix to your TV anymore.

title: My husband and I quit our jobs to travel for a year. My biggest concern was having a career gap on my résumé.
description: Maria Laposata and her husband budgeted $75,000 for their gap year, covering everything from flights and hotels to their Netflix bill.

description: Even though Netflix has the reputation for canceling shows early, there are a few Netflix Originals that didn't deserve all the time they got.

description: Chips Ahoy's strategy to stay relevant with Gen Z includes a cross-brand collaboration with Netflix's "Stranger Things" and its first fruity flavor.

title: The Stranger Things Kids Are Coming To Fortnite With A Few Major Exceptions
description:
Six years ago, Fortnite introduced Stranger Things' Eleven, Sheriff Hopper and even portals to the Upside Down into the game. With the fifth and final season starting on Netflix next week, Stranger Things is returning to Fornite with a new set of heroes crossing over.
Epic Games has revealed that Stranger Things' Mike, Dustin, Will, and Lucas are coming to Fortnite's Blitz Royale mode. Max, Steve, Nancy, Jonathan, and Robin apparently didn't make the cut. The artwork below features the Stranger Things kids--or perhaps young adults is more accurate now--with a backdrop revealing portals to the Upside Down across Hawkins and appearance by Vecna, the show's primary villain.

title: Fortnite Stranger Things Map: All Locations And Sights To See
description:
Fortnite's collaboration with the Netflix series Stranger Things gets its biggest drop yet this weekend with five new skins in the item shop and a branded takeover of the Blitz Royale mode.
Blitz Royale, which has quick, five-minute rounds of battle royale on a tiny island, got an entirely new map on November 21. The new island features four named locations based on the town of Hawkins, Indiana, as well as a border right down the middle separating the normal world from locations that have been corrupted by the Upside Down--essentially giving the map a pair of distinct biomes, something that Blitz hasn't done before since its map is already so little.
The map and the new item shop skins based on Vecna and the original four boys are the entirety of this takeover--there aren't any new Stranger Things weapons added to the loot pool or anything like that. That's fine, because between the ongoing Simpsons season and the imminent launch of Chapter 7, we've already got plenty of new mechanics to worry about.

title: Why Comcast could go all out to buy Warner Bros. Discovery
description: Paramount, Comcast, and Netflix are battling over Warner Bros. Discovery. Comcast may be more motivated to make a deal than David Ellison's Paramount.

title: Why I Quit Netflix, and You Should Too
description: At the very least, take a break.

title: Netflix, Comcast and Paramount Make Bids for Warner Bros.
description: Netflix Inc., Comcast Corp. and Paramount Skydance Corp. all submitted bids for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.
